revised_title: Zoological and Arachnida Discoveries in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez
tldr: The author, Arthur Gardiner Butler, presents a detailed account of the zoological and arachnida collections made during the Transit of Venus Expeditions in Kerguelen's Land and Rodriguez. The article discusses the various species of Myriopoda and Arachnida found in these locations, including new discoveries and their classification.
